duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop advanced Power BI dashboards for data visualization and analysis.
Utilize SQL, DAX, and M Query Language for data preparation and analysis.
Implement Dimensional modeling and data warehousing projects for effective data management.
Work with Data Lakes and Data Bricks in Azure for data processing and analysis.
Consult internal customers on the development of high-quality dashboards.
Present and communicate effectively in front of stakeholders.
Apply Agile working experience to deliver efficient and high-quality solutions.
